title: Total Training For Microsoft Expression Blend
description:
/!\\ : This version has all the files, unlike the previous torrent.


Title: 	Microsoft Expression Blend
	

Category: 	Development & Programming
Presenter: 	Dante Gagne
Dante Gagne has been an active member of Expression Blend since its first breakthrough. 
Currently he teaches the training classes Microsoft offers to its developers and designers. 
Additionally, Dante also creates and records materials to help field agents provide 
the most thorough and comprehensive lessons. Dante\&#039;s extensive background and teaching 
experience makes him a very knowledgeable and reliable trainer.
Platform: 	Windows & MAC OS
Format: 	Online*
Level: 	Beginner to Intermediate
Solutions: 	Multi-User   Education   Government   International
Description: 	Let Dante get you up and running with a video tour of Layouts and Controls in Expression Blend. 
Discover cool ways to create an animation and interact with 3D objects. 
Once you\&#039;re comfortable with the many tools in Expression Blend, it\&#039;s time to put the software to work for you. 
Learn about databinding and just how powerful it is. Then work with Events and Methods. 
Further fine-tune your skills with tips on how to reskin gadgets, design a custom layout container, and take advantage of control editing.

*This product is available on DVD as part of the
Microsoft Expression Studio Bundle


Running Time: 8.2 Hrs
Project Files: Included

Highlights

    * Learn how to design cutting-edge user interfaces and collaborate with developers to bring these stunning new types of applications to life.
    * Generate better user experiences with the tools you have always wanted and needed to get the job done right.
    * Unleash your creativity with elegant and compelling user interface designs using a full spectrum of media types, 
      including vector and pixel art, video, audio, and more, including bringing designs over from Expression Design.
    * See how easy it is to add interactivity to your designs without writing a single line of code.
    * Get the information you need to deliver applications that are more usable and achieve greater end-user satisfaction and productivity.


Presenter: Dante Gagne

Dante Gagne has been an active member of Expression Blend since its first breakthrough. 
Currently he teaches the training classes Microsoft offers to its developers and designers. 
Additionally, Dante also creates and records materials to help field agents provide the most thorough and comprehensive lessons. 
Dante\&#039;s extensive background and teaching experience makes him a very knowledgeable and reliable trainer.
